    Arabic Pasts – 2019 Call for Papers

    less than 1 minute read :: Posted on March 15, 2019

    Paper abstracts are now welcome for the annual “Arabic Pasts: Histories and Historiography” workshop, to be held 18 and 19th of October 2019 at the Aga Khan Centre, London. More details.
